AddOleObject.name: AddOleObject
AddOleObject.description: Adds an OLE object to the current document position.

params.name: data
params.description: The OLE object properties.

params.name: data.data
params.description: OLE object data (internal format).

params.name: data.imgSrc
params.description: A link to the image (its visual representation) stored in the OLE object and used by the plugin.

params.name: data.guid
params.description: An identifier of the plugin which can edit the current OLE object and must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

params.name: data.width
params.description: The OLE object width measured in millimeters.

params.name: data.height
params.description: The OLE object height measured in millimeters.

params.name: data.widthPix
params.description: The OLE object image width in pixels.

params.name: data.heightPix
params.description: The OLE object image height in pixels.

EditOleObject.name: EditOleObject
EditOleObject.description: Edits an OLE object in the document.

params.name: data
params.description: The OLE object properties.

params.name: data.data
params.description: OLE object data (internal format).

params.name: data.imgSrc
params.description: A link to the image (its visual representation) stored in the OLE object and used by the plugin.

params.name: data.objectId
params.description: The OLE object identifier.

params.name: data.width
params.description: The OLE object width measured in millimeters.

params.name: data.height
params.description: The OLE object height measured in millimeters.

params.name: data.widthPix
params.description: The OLE object image width in pixels.

params.name: data.heightPix
params.description: The OLE object image height in pixels.

params.name: text
params.description: A string value that specifies the text to be inserted into the document.

params.name: textReplace
params.description: A string value that specifies the text to be replaced with a new text.

PasteHtml.name: PasteHtml
PasteHtml.description: Pastes text in the HTML format into the document.

params.name: htmlText
params.description: A string value that specifies the text in the HTML format to be pasted into the document.

params.name: text
params.description: A string value that specifies the text to be pasted into the document.

params.name: data
params.description: The Macros object containing the data about all the macros from the document.

GetVBAMacros.name: GetVBAMacros
GetVBAMacros.description: Returns all VBA macros from the document.

StartAction.name: StartAction
StartAction.description: Specifies the start action for long operations.

params.name: type
params.description: A value which defines an action type which can take 0 if this is an Information action or 1 if this is a BlockInteraction action.

params.name: description
params.description: A string value that specifies the description text for the start action of the operation.

EndAction.name: EndAction
EndAction.description: Specifies the end action for long operations.

params.name: type
params.description: A value which defines an action type which can take "Block" if this is the BlockInteraction action or "Information if this is the Information action.

params.name: description
params.description: A string value that specifies the description text for the operation end action.

params.name: status
params.description: The error status code. If no error occurs, then an empty string is passed.

params.name: obj
params.description: The encryption properties.

params.name: obj.type
params.description:
The type of encrypting operation:

  • generatePassword - generates a password for the document,
  • getPasswordByFile - sends the password when opening the document,
  • encryptData - encrypts changes when co-editing,
  • decryptData - decrypts changes when co-editing.

params.name: obj.password
params.description: A string value specifying the password to access the document.

params.name: obj.data
params.description: Encrypted/decrypted changes.

params.name: obj.check
params.description: Checks if the encryption/decryption operation is successful or not (used only for encryptData or decryptData types).

params.name: obj.docinfo
params.description: An unencrypted part of the encrypted file.

params.name: obj.hash
params.description: A string value specifying a file hash (sha256 by default).

params.name: obj.error
params.description: A string value specifying an error that occurs (the "" value means that the operation is successful).

params.name: obj
params.description: The document properties.

params.name: obj.copyoutenabled
params.description: Disables copying from the editor if it is set to false.

params.name: obj.hideContentControlTrack
params.description: Disables tracking the content control if it is set to true.

params.name: obj.watermark_on_draw
params.description: A string value for {@link global#watermark_on_draw watermark properties} in JSON format.

params.name: obj.disableAutostartMacros
params.description: Sets a flag that specifies that macros are started automatically when the editor opens.

params.name: obj.fillForms
params.description: Sets rules in JSON format for filling document {@link global#fillForms forms} by tags.

params.name: guid
params.description: A string value which specifies a plugin identifier which must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

params.name: w
params.description: A number which specifies the window width measured in millimeters.

params.name: h
params.description: A number which specifies the window height measured in millimeters.

params.name: isKeyboardTake
params.description: Defines if the keyboard is caught (true) or not (alse).

params.name: guid
params.description: A string value which specifies a plugin identifier which must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

params.name: isclear
params.description: Defines if the input context will be cleared (true) or not (false).

CoAuthoringChatSendMessage.name: CoAuthoringChatSendMessage
CoAuthoringChatSendMessage.description: Sends a message to the co-authoring chat.

params.name: sText
params.description: Message text.

GetSelectionType.name: GetSelectionType
GetSelectionType.description: Returns the type of the current selection.

ConvertDocument.name: ConvertDocument
ConvertDocument.description: Converts a document to Markdown or HTML text.

params.name: sConvertType
params.description: Conversion type ("markdown" or "html").

params.name: bHtmlHeadings
params.description: Defines if the HTML headings and IDs will be generated when the Markdown renderer of your target platform does not handle Markdown-style IDs.

params.name: bBase64img
params.description: Defines if the images will be created in the base64 format.

params.name: bDemoteHeadings
params.description: Defines if all heading levels in your document will be demoted to conform with the following standard: single H1 as title, H2 as top-level heading in the text body.

params.name: bRenderHTMLTags
params.description: Defines if HTML tags will be preserved in your Markdown. If you just want to use an occasional HTML tag, you can avoid using the opening angle bracket in the following way: <tag>text</tag>. By default, the opening angle brackets will be replaced with the special characters.

GetSelectedText.name: GetSelectedText
GetSelectedText.description: Returns the selected text from the document.

params.name: prop
params.description: The resulting string display properties.

params.name: prop.NewLine
params.description: Defines if the resulting string will include line boundaries or not (they will be replaced with '\r').

params.name: prop.NewLineParagraph
params.description: Defines if the resulting string will include paragraph line boundaries or not.

params.name: prop.Numbering
params.description: Defines if the resulting string will include numbering or not.

params.name: prop.Math
params.description: Defines if the resulting string will include mathematical expressions or not.

params.name: prop.TableCellSeparator
params.description: Defines how the table cell separator will be specified in the resulting string.

params.name: prop.TableRowSeparator
params.description: Defines how the table row separator will be specified in the resulting string.

params.name: prop.ParaSeparator
params.description: Defines how the paragraph separator will be specified in the resulting string.

params.name: prop.TabSymbol
params.description: Defines how the tab will be specified in the resulting string.

params.name: prop.NewLineSeparator
params.description: Defines how the line separator will be specified in the resulting string (this property has the priority over NewLine).

ReplaceTextSmart.name: ReplaceTextSmart
ReplaceTextSmart.description: Replaces each paragraph (or text in cell) in the select with the corresponding text from an array of strings.

params.name: arrString
params.description: An array of replacement strings.

params.name: sParaTab
params.description: A character which is used to specify the tab in the source text.

params.name: sParaNewLine
params.description: A character which is used to specify the line break character in the source text.

GetFileToDownload.name: GetFileToDownload
GetFileToDownload.description: Returns the current file to download in the specified format.

params.name: format
params.description: A format in which you need to download a file.

GetImageDataFromSelection.name: GetImageDataFromSelection
GetImageDataFromSelection.description: Returns the image data from the first of the selected drawings. If there are no drawings selected, the method returns a white rectangle.

PutImageDataToSelection.name: PutImageDataToSelection
PutImageDataToSelection.description: Replaces the first selected drawing with the image specified in the parameters. If there are no drawings selected, the method inserts the image at the current position.

params.name: oImageData
params.description: The information about the base64 encoded png image.

RemovePlugin.name: RemovePlugin
RemovePlugin.description: Removes a plugin with the specified GUID.

params.name: guid
params.description: The plugin identifier. It must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

params.name: backup
params.description: The plugin backup. This parameter is used when working with the desktop editors.

InstallPlugin.name: InstallPlugin
InstallPlugin.description: Installs a plugin by the URL to the plugin config.

params.name: config
params.description: The plugin config for installing.

UpdatePlugin.name: UpdatePlugin
UpdatePlugin.description: Updates a plugin by the URL to the plugin config.

params.name: config
params.description: The plugin config for updating.

InstallDeveloperPlugin.name: InstallDeveloperPlugin
InstallDeveloperPlugin.description: Installs a plugin by the URL to the plugin config.

params.name: configUrl
params.description: The URL to the plugin config.json for installing.

ShowButton.name: ShowButton
ShowButton.description: Shows or hides buttons in the header.

params.name: id
params.description: The button ID.

params.name: bShow
params.description: The flag specifies whether the button is shown (true) or hidden (false).

params.name: obj
params.description: The drag&drop emulation properties.

params.name: obj.type
params.description:
The drag&drop event type:

  • onbeforedrop - an event that is fired when the selected text or element is dragged;
  • ondrop - an event that is fired when the selected text or element is dropped on a valid drop target.

params.name: obj.x
params.description: The horizontal coordinate (in pixels) at which the mouse was clicked, relative to the left edge of the entire document.

params.name: obj.y
params.description: The vertical coordinate (in pixels) at which the mouse was clicked, relative to the top edge of the entire document.

params.name: obj.html
params.description: The dragged HTML element.

params.name: obj.text
params.description: The dragged text.

AddContextMenuItem.name: AddContextMenuItem
AddContextMenuItem.description: Adds an item to the context menu.

params.name: items
params.description: An array containing the context menu items for the current item.

UpdateContextMenuItem.name: UpdateContextMenuItem
UpdateContextMenuItem.description: Updates an item in the context menu with the specified items.

params.name: items
params.description: An array containing the context menu items for the current item.

params.name: frameId
params.description: The frame ID.

params.name: variation
params.description: The plugin variation.

params.name: frameId
params.description: The frame ID.

SendToWindow.name: SendToWindow
SendToWindow.description: Sends a message to the plugin modal window.

params.name: windowID
params.description: The frame ID.

params.name: name
params.description: The event name.

params.name: data
params.description: The event data.

params.name: frameId
params.description: The frame ID.

params.name: size
params.description: The frame size.

params.name: minSize
params.description: The frame minimum size.

params.name: maxSize
params.description: The frame maximum size.

MouseUpWindow.name: MouseUpWindow
MouseUpWindow.description: Sends an event to the plugin when the mouse button is released inside the plugin iframe.

params.name: frameId
params.description: The frame ID.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate.

MouseMoveWindow.name: MouseMoveWindow
MouseMoveWindow.description: Sends an event to the plugin when the mouse button is moved inside the plugin iframe.

params.name: frameId
params.description: The frame ID.

params.name: x
params.description: The X coordinate.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y coordinate.
